B17R2010.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','Y','U','Y','N') AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM 
     TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
    ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.PROC_CD = A.PROC_CD
    AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
    AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
    AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
    AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
         ]]>

B17R2010.select.1row.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.select.1row   박철오  */ 	
    T.*
 FROM 
    (SELECT  
            -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
            -- WK_TP => 
            -- 'I' => 작업지시
            -- 'U' => 보급
            -- 'S' => 공정
            -- 'A' => 소둔
            -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
            'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
            ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
            ,A.PROC_CD
            ,C.MO_NO
            ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
            ,A.COIL_ID
            ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','Y','U','Y','N') AS L2_SND_YN
            ,(SELECT 
                    COUNT(*) 
              FROM TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
                  ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
              WHERE
                    C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
--                AND C.PROC_CD = A.PROC_CD
--                AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
                AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
                AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
                AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
                AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
                AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD) AS L2_SND_QTY
            ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
            ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
            ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
            ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
            ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
            ,NULL AS SPARE
            ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
        FROM 
             TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
            ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
        WHERE
                C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
--            AND C.PROC_CD = A.PROC_CD
--            AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
            AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
            AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
            AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
            AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
            AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
        ORDER BY A.WORD_DD, A.MO_WK_RNK, A.COIL_WK_RNK 
    ) T
WHERE 
    ROWNUM = 1
         ]]>

B17R2010.L2N.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.L2N.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'N' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM 
     TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
    ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.PROC_CD = A.PROC_CD
    AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
    AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
    AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
    AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
         ]]>

B17R2010.L2N.select.1row.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.L2N.select.1row   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'N' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,(SELECT 
                COUNT(*) 
          FROM TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
              ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
          WHERE
                C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
            AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
            AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
            AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
            AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
            AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD) AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM 
     TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
    ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND C.WK_PRG_STS IN ('E1','F1')
    AND NVL(A.L2_SND_YN,'N')='N'
    AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='N'
    AND A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
    AND ROWNUM=1
         ]]>

B17R2010.ann.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.ann.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'N' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM 
     TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
    ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND A.ANN_BTH_CRT_DH = TO_DATE(:ANN_BTH_CRT_DH,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
         ]]>

B17R2010.ann.cancelBth.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.ann.cancelBth.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','E','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','E','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'N' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','N') AS CHG_WRG_YN
    ,'1' AS WK_CNL_TP
FROM 
     
      TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
    , TB_M47_WK_ACT_ANNB B
    , TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND NVL(A.CHG_WRG_YN,'N')='Y'
    AND C.ANN_STS = 'Y'
    AND C.PROC_CD = :PROC_CD
    AND A.PROC_CD LIKE '4%'
    AND C.COIL_ID = B.COIL_ID
   	AND B.ANN_BTH_ID = :ANN_BTH_ID
         ]]>

B17R2010.unload.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.unload.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정투입
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','Y','U','Y','S','Y') AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','') AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'S',TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','S','Y','') AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM 
      TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
     ,TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
WHERE
        A.COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
  AND   A.PROC_CD = :PROC_CD
  AND   A.PLN_PROC_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(PLN_PROC_SEQ)
                            FROM TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN
                           WHERE COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
                             AND PROC_CD = :PROC_CD)
  AND   A.COIL_ID = C.COIL_ID
         ]]>

B17R2010.cancel.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.cancel.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'U' => 보급 취소
    -- 'S' => 공정투입 취소
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,B.PROC_CD
    ,A.MO_NO
    ,B.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,B.COIL_ID
    ,B.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','F','S','G',A.PRG_CD) AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','F1','S','G1',A.WK_PRG_STS) AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,NULL AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,NULL AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,NULL AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,NULL AS CHG_WRG_YN
    ,:WK_CNL_TP AS WK_CNL_TP
FROM 
       TB_M47_COIL_CMN    A 
      ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN B
WHERE
        B.PROC_CD = :PROC_CD
  AND   B.COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
  AND   B.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
  AND   B.PLN_PROC_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(PLN_PROC_SEQ)
                            FROM TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN
                           WHERE COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
                             AND PROC_CD = :PROC_CD)
         ]]>

B17R2010.case1.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.case1.select   박철오  */
	-- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F','U','G','S','G','') AS PRG_CD
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','F1','U','G1','S','G2','') AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'I','Y','U','Y') AS L2_SND_YN
    ,DECODE(:WK_TP,'U','Y','') AS CHG_WRG_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,NULL AS SLP_END_YN
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
FROM
     TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
    ,TB_M47_COIL_CMN   C
WHERE
         A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
    AND  A.L2_SND_YN='N'
    AND  A.COIL_ID = C.COIL_ID
         ]]>

B17R2010.case2.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.case2.select   박철오  */
	-- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,'F' AS PRG_CD
    ,'F1' AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,NULL AS L2_SND_YN
    ,NULL AS CHG_WRG_YN
    ,NULL AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,NULL AS SLP_END_YN
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
FROM
     TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
    ,TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
WHERE
         A.PROC_CD= :PROC_CD
    AND  A.L2_SND_YN='N'
    AND  A.COIL_ID = C.COIL_ID
         ]]>

B17R2010.procInput.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.procInput.select   박철오  */
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,A.FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,A.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,'G' AS PRG_CD
    ,'G2' AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'Y' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,'Y' AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_CHAR('','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,'Y' AS CHG_WRG_YN
FROM
    TB_M47_COIL_CMN A
WHERE
         A.PROC_CD = :PROC_CD
    AND  A.COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
         ]]>

B17R2010.ann.cancelBas.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT  /*+ M47   재료진행상태관제전송   B17R2010.ann.cancelBas.select   박철오  */
    -- 관제로 전송할 정보 조회
    -- WK_TP => 
    -- 'I' => 작업지시
    -- 'U' => 보급
    -- 'S' => 공정
    -- 'A' => 소둔
    -- 'E' => 보급시점 L2전송
    'B17R2010'    AS TC_CD
    ,MESAPUSER.PL_M00_CONST_VALUE.FAC_CD_BUSAN AS FAC_CD
    ,A.PROC_CD
    ,C.MO_NO
    ,A.MO_PTL_SEQ_NO
    ,A.COIL_ID
    ,A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    ,'G' AS PRG_CD
    ,'G1' AS WK_PRG_STS
    ,'N' AS L2_SND_YN
    ,1 AS L2_SND_QTY
    ,NULL AS QRT_END_YN
    ,NULL AS WDR_END_YN
    ,'Y' AS SLP_END_YN
    ,NULL AS ENT_PTL_YN
    ,NULL AS WK_STR_DH
    ,NULL AS WK_END_DH    
    ,NULL AS PCOIL_ID
    ,NULL AS SPARE
    ,'Y' AS CHG_WRG_YN
    ,'4' AS WK_CNL_TP
FROM 
     TB_M47_COIL_CMN    C
    ,TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN A
WHERE
        C.COIL_ID = A.COIL_ID
    AND C.PLN_PROC_SEQ = A.PLN_PROC_SEQ
    AND C.RCD_STS_TP IN ('1','2')
    AND A.PROC_CD LIKE '4%'
    AND C.COIL_ID IN(SELECT
                         A.COIL_ID
                      FROM  
                         TB_M47_COIL_CMN A
                        ,TB_M47_WK_ACT_ANNB B
                     WHERE  
                             A.COIL_ID = B.COIL_ID
                        AND  B.ANN_BTH_ID = :ANN_BTH_ID
                        AND  A.ANN_STS ='2')
         ]]>

B47SA508_1.select.query:
<![CDATA[
SELECT    /*+ M47 부산_조업관리_송신_작업실적요구 송신  B47SA508_1.select 정장현 */
          COIL_ID
        , MO_NO
FROM TB_M47_WK_INST_CMN
WHERE COIL_ID = :COIL_ID
         ]]>
